participant_2.background:
I am an avid kayaker.
I enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.
I am also a graduate student.
My parents taught me survival skills.

content.text: Hi! I'm interested in learning more about you. What's your favorite hobby?
I'm an avid kayaker. I love being out on the water and exploring new places.
That sounds really fun! I've always wanted to try kayaking, but I've never had the opportunity.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I will! What's your favorite place to kayak?
I love kayaking in the ocean, but I also enjoy kayaking on lakes and rivers.
I can imagine! It must be so peaceful to be out on the water.
It is! I love being able to relax and enjoy the scenery.
So, what else are you interested in?
I'm also a graduate student in psychology. I'm interested in studying how people think and behave.
That sounds really interesting! I'm not very good at psychology, but I find it fascinating.
It's a lot of fun! I love learning about how the human mind works.
So, what's your favorite psychology book?
I really enjoyed "Thinking, Fast and Slow" by Daniel Kahneman. It's a great book that explains how our brains make decisions.
I'll have to check that out! I'm always looking for new books to read.
I'm sure you'll like it. It's a really informative book.
It sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies.
I do! I like to keep busy.
I can tell! You seem like a very active person.
I try to be! I like to stay on my toes.
I'm impressed! I'm not as active as I should be.
You should start kayaking! It's a great way to get moving.
I will! I've definitely been thinking about it.
I'm sure you'd love it.
Thanks! I'm excited to try it.
